title: Reddit
cleaned_text: Residency [r/Residency](/r/Residency/) The sub is currently going dark based on a vote by users. The sub will be back up tomorrow night. Welcome to the Residency subreddit, a community of interns and residents who are just trying to make it through training! This is a subreddit specifically for interns and residents to get together and discuss issues concerning their training and medicine/surgery. Have any of you interacted with them that much in your training? I was curious because I've seen some academic places allow NDs in some places, and yet they're still biased against taking DO candidates......
